meanings.definition: Plural of superman: men with exceptional abilities or powers
meanings.sent1: The supermen in the comic book saved the city from disaster.
meanings.sent2: The group of supermen worked together to defeat the villain.
meanings.sent3: The supermen decided to have a friendly competition to see who was the strongest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, the supermen stand out as the most powerful.
meanings.sent5: The supermen's bravery and strength inspired others to be courageous.

meanings.definition: Third person plural present of superman: they exhibit exceptional abilities or powers
meanings.sent1: When the supermen arrived, everyone knew they were in good hands.
meanings.sent2: The supermen always come to the rescue when there is trouble.
meanings.sent3: The supermen decided to take a day off and relax in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The supermen's presence alone made the situation feel safer and more secure.
meanings.sent5: People looked up to the supermen with admiration and respect.
